parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the airbag system can lead to false warnings, unexpected deployments, or failure to deploy in the event of an accident, which can increase the risk of injury or fatality.
symptoms: The airbag warning light stays on continuously
the passenger airbag light is on and stays on
the driver-side airbag deploys unexpectedly
the airbag light malfunctions
the seat belt latch assembly malfunctions
the airbag indicator light remains on.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The potential presence of Takata airbags in the 1999 BMW Z3 can pose a risk to vehicle occupants due to the possibility of rupture or explosion, which can cause serious injury or fatality.
symptoms: Uncertainty about the type of airbags installed in the vehicle
concern about the potential presence of Takata airbags.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear subframe can cause the differential to tear away from the bracket, leading to a loss of control and potential accidents. It can also cause the trunk floor to fall out, posing a massive safety issue.
symptoms: Squeaking noises from the rear
back tires kicking out and looking strange
vibrating sound from the back tires
loud shuttering noise from the rear
tearing or cracking of the spot welds
differential mount failure
trunk floor falling out.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear differential mount can cause the differential to hang from underneath the vehicle, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potential harm to drivers, passengers, and other road users.
symptoms: Clanking or loud "pop" sounds from the rear end
metal sounds coming from the back
difficulty controlling the vehicle
wheels fracturing from the subframe
and visual signs of the differential mount separating from the differential.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The separation of the rear differential housing from the subframe can cause the rear alignment to be off, leading to uneven tire wear, reduced vehicle stability, and potentially causing the trunk floor to tear out and the differential to fall to the ground, which can result in accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: Clunking noise from the rear while shifting in the first two gears
squeaking noise from the back of the vehicle
uneven tire wear
reduced vehicle stability.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Loose sway bar end links can cause uneven tire wear, reduced vehicle stability, and potentially lead to loss of control.
symptoms: Sway bar end links came loose
uneven tire wear
reduced vehicle stability.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the seatbelt retractor can cause the seatbelt to lock up or not release, potentially leading to injuries or accidents. Additionally, the inability to use the safety belt can compromise the safety of the occupants.
symptoms: The seatbelt does not retract back into the holder
the seatbelt locks up and will not release
the seatbelt does not come out of the retractor
the seatbelt fails to release when needed.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The misalignment of the convertible top can cause leaks and gaps, potentially leading to water damage, electrical issues, and reduced vehicle safety.
symptoms: Leaks and gaps are visible in the convertible top
water enters the vehicle through the top.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The hesitation of the vehicle can cause unexpected slowing or stalling, potentially leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The vehicle hesitates but has not stalled yet.
